channel.title: katello on devopstales
channel.description: Recent content in katello on devopstales

item.title: Install Foreman PXE boot
item.description: Foreman is a complete lifecycle management tool for physical and virtual servers. We give system administrators the power to easily automate repetitive tasks, quickly deploy applications, and proactively manage servers, on-premise or in the cloud.

item.title: Install Katello client
item.description: Katello brings the full power of content management alongside the provisioning and configuration capabilities of Foreman. Katello is the upstream community project from which the Red Hat Satellite product is derived after Red Hat Satellite Server 6.

item.title: Install Errata
item.description: Katello brings the full power of content management alongside the provisioning and configuration capabilities of Foreman. Katello is the upstream community project from which the Red Hat Satellite product is derived after Red Hat Satellite Server 6.
